title: Does Rudolf Steiner Believe in Viruses?
cleaned_text: What is existence? This is, of course, and a rather fundamental question. I've been thinking about it a bit recently, after someone told me "the etheric and astral bodies don't exist, Daniel." From a certain the point of view, this is, of course, absolutely true.
